item.title: Mac Book Pro
item.description: Mac Book Pro Short Cuts Working With Files and Folders Mac Book Pro Short Cuts Show Desktop -> Command + F3 Split Window -> https://support.apple.com/en-in/HT204948 Hidden File and Folders -> Command + Shift + . (period) keys at the same time Working With Files and Folders Command + N -> Open Finder While On Finder Window View Menu/Show Path Bar. From the Path Bar, Open finder in new Tab (Finder can be opened in multiple tabs) Top Right corner has + button to open new Finder Tab.
